document_data.name: Tombgate
document_data.mainbody: '''Tombgate''' was a portal spanning [[Tsarn Tombs]] and [[Eveningstar]].
document_data.Powers: One end of the gate was at [[Eveningstar Gorge]] just a little way from [[Eveningstar]] itself. It led to [[Tsarn Tombs]] near [[Scornubel]].
document_data.Rumors & Legends: Hlael Toraunt thought [[Hesperdan]] would know where Tombgate led.
